rukus.text: Prykroshchi do cheaters
Khto vymahayutʹ povnoyi miry otrymuyuchy z lyudey
Ale dayuchy yim zakhody abo tyahari, vony obduryuyutʹ
vony ne znayutʹ shcho vony budutʹ resurrected
Na velycheznomu dni
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly vsi lyudy lyshatʹsya v syli pered tym, yak Lord vsesvitu
Diysno, knyha bezputna u Sijjeen
vy znayete shcho Sijjeen
chyselʹno structured knyha
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Vony ne viryatʹ v Dnyu Vyroku
Nikhto disbelieves tam krim porushnyka, sinful
Koly nashi vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yomu, vin kazhe, "Povisti z mynuli
Diysno, yikhni serdenʹka stavaly shielded yikhnimy hrikhamy
Diysno, vony budutʹ izolyuvatysya, na shcho denʹ, z yikhnʹoho Lorda
Todi vony budutʹ kydatysya u Peklo
Vony budutʹ rozpovidatysya, "Tse ye yaki vy zvychayno zaperechuvaly
Diysno, knyha spravedlyva bude u `elleyyeen
vy znayete shcho `elleyyeen
chyselʹno structured knyha
Shchob buty zasvidchenyy tsym zakryttyam do Meni
spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly blazhenstvo
Na rozkishnomu vbranni vony sposterihayutʹ
Vy vyznayete u yikhnikh oblychchi radistʹ blazhenstva
Yikhni napiy budutʹ spiced z nektarom
Yoho spice vyhlyadaye yak musk. Tse ye shcho konkurenty musyatʹ konkuruvaty
Zmishuyutʹsya u tse budutʹ spetsialʹni smak
Z vesny shcho rezervuyetʹsya dlya tsʹoho zakryttya do Meni
bezputnyy zvychayno smiyavsya z tsykh khto vvazhaly
Koly vony proyshly povz nykh, vony zvychayno shtovkhaly utikhu
Koly vony pryyikhaly razom z yikhnimy lyudʹmy, vony zvychayno zhartuvaly
Koly zavhodno vony pobachyly yikh, vony skazaly, "Tsi lyudy daleko astray
Vony ne mayutʹ takoyi rechi yak (nevydymoyi) varty
Sʹohodni, tsey khto povirenyy smiyutʹsya z disbelievers
Na rozkishnomu vbranni vony sposterihayutʹ
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, disbelievers requited za shcho vony
